artist: Manufacturer: Attributed to Kyser & Rex Company; Manufacturer: or Kenton Hardware Manufacturing Co.
description: round central building with red dome on top; two wings on either side of building with arched windows on front and back side and diamond and club-shaped opening to one side of wings; red arched doorway on bottom on either side
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

on roof, inscribed: [PRESTO]; on arch of front door, inscribed: [BANK]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [#215.17 / \"Presto Bank\" / (Small Bldg) / 6990 150 / 4155 / #199M]
title: "Presto Bank" mechanical bank
